title: Global leading fishing nations 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Capture in million metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Capture in million metric tons and Myanmar has the lowest Capture in million metric tons.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Capture in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Capture in million metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Capture in million metric tons and Myanmar has the lowest Capture in million metric tons.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Capture in million metric tons and Myanmar has the lowest Capture in million metric tons.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
The Country China has the highest Capture in million metric tons, followed by Indonesia, and India. Down to the Country Myanmar which is the lowest.
The Country China tends to be 2.92 percent higher than average.
The Capture in million metric tons is 52.56 if we add up values of all Countrys.
